cast.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookies, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewellers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
cast.title: Snatch

details.biography: Before Alex Andreas did his formal training at LSMT (London School of Musical Theatre), he actually worked as a bodyguard for the likes of The Gap Band, Eurhythmics to name but a few. After leaving LSMT, Alex went on to play the part of the Big Bopper in the smash hit musical The Buddy Holly story. He toured the whole of the UK, Germany, Denmark and even Prince Renoirs club in Monte Carlo. He then went on to work in film and television with the likes of Brad Pitt, Jason Statham, and Guy Richie in the hit film Snatch. Some of his television credits include the BBC comedy My Hero with Ardle O'Hanlon, and the Channel 4 show, Make My Day with Mark Owen (from Take That).
details.name: Alex Andreas
